content:
317 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (xxi)  KSU, ILORIN and IAUED do not accept 'O' level credit 
pass in Physics In lieu of Geography.  
(xxii)AAUA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to include 
English Language, Geography,Mathematics and any 
other two (2) Social Science or Science subjects.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) MINNA requires Geography/Physics and any two (2) 
subjects from Mathematics, Biology and Physics.  
(ii) OOU and DELSU do not accept Arts subjects.  
(iii) BENIN accepts Geography, Mathematics and any 
other subject.  
(iv) LASU requires Geography, Government or Economics.  
(v) DELSU requires Geography/Physics and one (1) of 
Mathematics/Economics/Government.  
(vi) LAPAI requires other subjects from the Sciences.  
(vii) ILORIN and LAGOS donot accept Physics.  
(viii) IAUED requires any three (3) subjects.  
(ix) LAGOS accepts any three (3) Of Literature in English,  
History/Government, French/Arabic, Geography,  
Mathematics, any Nigerian Language, Christian  
Religious Studies/IslamicStudies, 
Economics/Commerce.  
(x) KSU accepts any Science subject in addition to the 
Arts and Social Science.  
(xi) MAUTY requires Geography and any two (2) of  
 Economics,  Mathematics,  Physics,  Chemistry,  
Biology/Agricultural Science.  
(xii) AAUA accepts Geography, Mathematics and any other 
Social Science or Science subject.
